'Brookline' is a suburban town in Norfolk County, Massachusetts, United States,
on the western edge of Boston and east of Newton. As of the 2010 census, the
population of the town was 58,732. Brookline was first settled in 1638 as a
hamlet in Boston, but was incorporated as a separate town in 1705.
